name: Phantom Shift
description:
Shift through two connected dimensions to get further through the temple.

no you are not deaf, there is just no sound

(Game is only a proof of concept but i  probably will update it some day)

Controls with WASD or arrow keys. 

You can jump with the space bar

shift through both dimensions with enter and C

there is only one level and there is no way to complete it. Just explore

there are two levels
